name: Barely Afloat
description:
Designed and written for Global Game Jam 2015 in under 48 hours. Play as an innocent child who has just awoken to a sinking ship, on a quest to find her parents.

Thanks to Marcus Holm, Ben Decker, Tanner Howell, and Pamela Pizarro-Ruiz, the amazing group that made this game possible.
